sentences.sContent: The gait of a human being or other biped in which the feet are lifted alternately with one part of a foot always on the ground.
sentences.sContent_eng: The gait of a human being or other biped in which the feet are lifted alternately with one part of a foot always on the ground.
sentences.sCn: 步法，脚步人或其他两足动物的步法，双脚轮流提空，一只脚的某一部分始终接触地面。

remMethod.val: bi (两个， 二) + ped (足， 脚) → 两足动物

trans.tranOther: an animal with two legs, such as a human
